name: Qube Saga
description:
Minecraft is too lame, 3DMax is too hard? We've got you covered!

Always wanted to be a 3D designer, but Blender seems to be too overwhelming? Need to make a quick collaborative 3D sketch? Want to relax and see cool simulations and run around your own designed environments? Need to discuss a design idea with your colleagues? Then look no further! This tool allows multiple users to place thousands of objects in a single scene, including uploading complex custom designed models (up to 150 k tris each), AR/VR modes supported, in-game voice chat available, easy UV unwrap, easy position, convenient UI, smooth UX experience.
